title: Sum of Array
description: Given an array of integers, return the sum using reduce().

title: Find Maximum Value
description: Return the maximum element in an array using max().

title: Count Vowels in String
description: Count how many vowels appear in a given string.

title: Remove Duplicates from Array
solution:
let arr=[1,2,2,3]
var seen:Set<Int>=[]
print(arr.filter{ seen.insert($0).inserted })
hints: Use Set to track seen values.

title: Check Palindrome String
description: Return true if a given string is palindrome ignoring case.

title: Find Word Frequencies
description: Given a sentence, return a dictionary mapping each word to its frequency.

title: Sort Array of Strings Alphabetically
description: Sort an array of strings in ascending order using sorted().

title: Return Even Numbers from Array
description: Filter an array and return only even numbers.

title: Square Each Number
description: Use map() to square each integer in an array.

title: Check Key Exists in Dictionary
description: Given a dictionary and a key, check if key exists using contains(where:).
